server_side.pictionary

Class Pictionary

  • java.lang.Object
    • server_side.pictionary.Pictionary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PictionaryInterface

    public class Pictionary
extends Object
implements PictionaryInterface
    Pictionary game Starts on server and inform server/clients about game progress, events. Main goal of game is simple - host has to draw choosen word and listeners have to guess what the word is. Good guess makes 2 points and host get extra one point. The winner of the game is player who has most the most points.
